name: Football, Tactics & Glory
description: Football, Tactics & Glory is using a ball rather than swords and sorcery in turn-based battles, developing a club instead of a castle, and leveling up your units after clashes on the stadium. “Anticipate obsession.” - Rock Paper Shotgun.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Shaders 3.0, minimal resolution 1024 x 768, recommended dedicated graphics card with 512 MB of RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 800 MB available space
